name: Brick Breaker (itch) (x00F)
description:
Bounce the ball at the correct angle to hit the ball back at the bricks! Can you beat all 5 levels? This is a recreation of Breakout from Atari Inc.

NOTE: PC Only

Move Left: A / Left Arrow

Move Right: D / Right Arrow

Check out these sources:

Zigurous - YouTube

https://freesound.org/people/BloodPixelHero
